name: ssind
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

comment: A deduction showing that a subclass of two classes is a subclass of their intersection. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)
